movie.title: Pope John Paul II
movie.plot: Bio-drama tracing the life and career of Polish cardinal Karol Wojtyla from his days as a young activist in Poland to his rise and installation in 1978 as Pope of the Catholic world.

events.title: Gerry Austin and John drive down through the South Island of New Zealand

movie.title: Goodbye Pork Pie
movie.plot: Gerry hires a car in Kaitaia with a stolen licence and travels to Invercargill with John, who's wife has just left him. The ultimate NZ roadtrip adventure.
